name: The Endless Bat Fight
description:
Game, Audio and some art: JonasMG

Most art: Kuang-Yu Cheng (https://cheng8141.itch.io/) Thank you!

Use A and D to move left and right

Jump with Space

Shoot with left and right click

Pause with P

Endless runner: You just keep on going man, never stop!

Fantasy: The game is set in a fantasy world but also has traits of fantasy from my imagination lol

Devil may care: It was stupid to piss off an evil and powerfull bat... But the wizard did it anyway cuz he thought he was good enough :P

Epic music: NOW THAT'S SOME EPIC MUSIC WITH SOMETHING THAT SOUNDS LIKE A CHOIR IN ONE OF THE LEADS!!

Thank you for playing! :)
